Implement Self-Enforcing Release Process
description: See docs/architecture/SELF_ENFORCING_RELEASE_PROCESS.md for detailed plan.
notes: Phase 0-1 COMPLETE: Release client (scripts/release.sh) and controller (.github/workflows/release-controller.yml) implemented. Ready for Phase 2: canonical version management.

title: Phase 0-1: Establish Release Requests and Controller
description: Implement scripts/release.sh and release-controller.yml
notes: Phase 0-1 complete: release client (scripts/release.sh) and controller (.github/workflows/release-controller.yml) implemented. Tested locally. Submodule cleanup completed (pw-702). Ready for Phase 2.

title: Phase 2: Make package.json.version Canonical
description: Update release-controller to handle version bumps and tagging
notes: Phase 2 complete: Reorganized release-controller workflow to make package.json canonical. Version now flows: package.json → compute-version → update-version (bump package.json) → build-site (generates data/version.json for Hugo footer) → deploy-site.

title: Phase 3: Enforce Guardrails
description: Add version-consistency.yml and update docs
notes: Phase 3 complete: version-consistency.yml workflow blocks unauthorized version edits, AGENTS.md updated with mandatory self-enforcing release workflow.

title: Phase 4: Auditing and Cleanup
description: Add orphan-rc-auditor.yml and Beads integration
notes:
Phase 4: Auditing and Cleanup - COMPLETE
- orphan-rc-auditor.yml: Scheduled job detects stale RC tags (no final promotion) and creates/updates GitHub issues
- update-beads-status job: Added to release-controller.yml to track release metadata (version, tag, CI run link)
- Ready for Beads MCP integration once bd CLI available in CI environment

notes: CSP removed due to GitHub Pages meta tag implementation breaking dynamic JavaScript functionality. Will implement proper server-side CSP when migrating to Netlify/Vercel/Cloudflare Pages which support HTTP headers.

title: Fix accessibility focus management test failure
notes: BDD test discovered color contrast issues on homepage. Secondary text (#f43098) has 3.66:1 contrast vs 4.5:1 required. Accent text (#00d3bb) has 1.9:1 contrast vs 4.5:1 required. Need to adjust featured items section styling.

title: Phase 3: Load Testing - k6 Concurrent User Scenarios
description: Reference: docs/development/TESTING_GAPS_ANALYSIS.md Phase 3. Set up k6 load testing, create scenarios for 100/500/1000 concurrent users on key pages. Baseline response times. CI integration (report-only). Effort: 2-3 days.

title: Investigate portfolio page loading and element visibility issues
notes: Successfully fixed E2E portfolio navigation issue! The problem was that the test selector was finding the mobile hamburger menu link instead of the desktop navigation link. Fixed by using more specific selector: 'nav ul[role="menubar"] a[href="/portfolio/"]' instead of 'nav a[href="/portfolio/"]'. Also fixed h1 strict mode violations by using more specific selectors. The complete user journey from homepage to portfolio is now working.

title: Task 1: Mark 10 verified versions complete in beads (v0.4.0-v0.16.0)

notes: Fixed navigation URL consistency - added trailing slashes to all navigation links in both mobile and desktop menus. Tests should now pass E2E journeys.
